name: Explore Fish Feeding and Grow
summary:
Its all about surviving and growing so, for growing you need to hunt small fishes and other sea creatures.
Explore the Sea World and find out hidden Diamonds.
Help the Little Fish to reach its Destination in its Ocean.

Help your Fish to find out hidden Diamonds and you can help your fish by killing any two fishes or any two sea creatures.
After killing any two fishes, guiding arrow will appears on your screen and it will guide you to the Hidden Diamond.

Fun for all ages
Fun to Play!!!
